alert.note: Alert for Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 17 at 7:58AM CDT until further notice by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 AM CDT FOR NORTHERN LEAKE AND SOUTHEASTERN ATTALA COUNTIES... At 757 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Singleton, or 10 miles south of Kosciusko, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Smyrna around 805 AM CDT. Renfroe around 815 AM CDT. Zama around 820 AM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
